item.title: Intro
item.description: Who am I? My name is Austin, I’m 29, I live in Cincinnati OH, come fight me. I work as a DevOps engineer for GE, for our internal Web Services/Web Hosting group. I enjoy: Vidya Cooking Homelabbery Programming Music (Guitar, Drums, Vocals) Sharing things I’ve learned What is this place? I’ve wanted a blog for as long as I can remember. As I’ve gotten older, (into my late 20s at the time of writing this), I’ve struggled with depression, anxiety and a host of other health issues; tldr, now, more than ever, I need a place for my thoughts.
